attributes.action: Ensure vaccine passports are enforced for the house of commons
attributes.additional_details: Enforce the vaccine passport rules equally across all levels of society or do not enforce them at all.
attributes.background:
Vaccine passports are set to be introduced for night clubs and large capacity venues by the end of September.

As the house of commons has 650 MP's plus staff. These measures should therefore be introduced for MP's or staff to attend.

Rules and laws must be applied equally across society.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593408
